column1: '''Solmath''' was the second month of the [[Shire Calendar]]
column2: with thirty days approximately corresponding to modern [[22 January]] through [[20 February]].<ref name=cal>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

column1: The name represents a [[Hobbitish|modernization]] of the [[Old English]] name for February
column3: meaning "mud-month" (cf. ''soil'').<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/md_smn.html|articlename=The Shire month-names|author=[[Arden R. Smith]]|website=[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron Mellonath Daeron - The Language Guild of the Forodrim]}}</ref><ref>{{HM|IE}}
